content: Generate a fill in the blank lyrics for a rap song.

Sure! Here's a fill-in-the-blank rap lyric for you:

---

(Verse 1)  
I'm rising to the top, never gonna ____,  
With dreams so big, I can touch the ____.  
Hustle every day, no time to ____,  
In this game of life, I'm the one to ____.  

(Chorus)  
From the streets to the ____, we make it ____,  
Living the dream, with my whole _____.  
Grinding every night, till the break of ____,  
In this rap game, I'm never ____.  

(Verse 2)  
Got my crew by my side, we never ____,  
Building an empire, brick by ____.  
Facing every challenge, never feeling ____,  
In the world of rap, we're the ____.  

(Bridge)  
Life's a journey, not just a ____,  
With every step, we leave our ____.  
Facing the haters, we never ____,  
In this story of ours, we're the ____.  

(Chorus)  
From the streets to the ____, we make it ____,  
Living the dream, with my whole _____.  
Grinding every night, till the break of ____,  
In this rap game, I'm never ____.  

---

Feel free to fill in the blanks with words or phrases that resonate with your style and message!
